Name: bacterial sepsis
Definition: A bacterial infectious disease has_material_basis_in Bacteria.

Name: primary bacterial infectious disease
Definition: A bacterial infectious disease that results_in infection by bacteria as a result of their presence or activity within the normal

Name: commensal bacterial infectious disease
Definition: A bacterial infectious disease that results_in infection by bacteria which are part of the normal human flora when one or more of the defense mechanisms designed to restrict them from the usually sterile internal tissues are breached by accident

Name: opportunistic bacterial infectious disease
Definition: A bacterial infectious disease that results_in infection by bacteria in individuals whose host defense mechanisms have been compromised.

Name: obsolete opportunistic Actinomycetales infectious disease
Definition: A bacterial infectious disease that results_in infection by bacteria in individuals whose host defense mechanisms have been compromised.

Name: rheumatic fever
